desc: PranaRest Luxury Memory Foam Pillows are Copper Gel Infused and enrobed in our Silky- Smooth CoolTouch Cover. Our Patented Posture Perfect Pilllow is designed to alleviate Neck Pain and our Pregnancy Pillow provides the optimal support and comfort. All PranaRest pillows come with our 101-Night Sleep Trial.

layout.text: The Posture Perfect Pillow Eliminates Neck Pain
